posts.post_title: Wright & Ditson scorecards with color lithos, etc.
posts.post_content:
Posted By: runscott
I have four different unused W&D scorecards with the color player lithos, on ebay.  Also, some nice baseball photos and other items.  I will be adding additional baseball memorabilia over the next few days, including Japanese 1911-ish postcards, an 1880's cricket buckle, gorgeous 1920-ish W&D baseball suit (truly suit quality).

Here's the current list, but look for more additions - about 40 more items to add.  Thanks, Scott

[url]http://search.ebay.com/_W0QQfgtpZ1QQfrppZ25QQsassZrunscott[/url]
